channel.title: hugo on dev log
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on dev log

item.title: How to add a new Hugo blog post
item.description: Go to blog folder hugo new posts/name-of-the-new-post.md Write your post. Back to blog folder and then hugo server -D Then you can preview your blog locally. Deploy production Change draft=true in the blog post and then hugo Push to remote master. Done.
